party.name: Alkermes, Inc.
party.capacity: Wholly owned indirect subsidiary of Alkermes plc

party.name: Mural Oncology, Inc.
party.capacity: Wholly owned direct subsidiary of Mural Oncology plc

offerAndAcceptance.offer: Transition services to be provided from Alkermes US to Mural US.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Mural US accepts the offer for services as detailed in the Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Agreement signed by both parties on November 13, 2023.

consideration.value: To be determined based on Transition Service Schedules.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend to create legal relations through this Agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The purpose of this contract is legal and valid.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Provision of specified services during the term of the Agreement.
certaintyOfTerms.price: Fees set forth in Transition Service Schedule.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Service period extends to a maximum of two years.

contract.consent: Consent required for subcontracting and third-party agreements as specified.
contract.formAndFormalities: Agreement executed in counterparts and electronically.

durationAndTermination.duration: Term of services not to exceed two years following the commencement.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Termination upon breach or insolvency as specified.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Renewal terms subject to mutual agreement.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: Parties acknowledge provisions regarding indemnification and liability.
contract.indemnification: Indemnification terms specified in Article VIII of the Agreement.

disputeResolution.details: Details provided in Article VII of the Agreement.

contract.severability: If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain effective.
contract.forceMajeure: Neither party liable for delays due to unforeseen circumstances.
contract.confidentiality: Obligations of confidentiality and data protection in Article IX.
contract.assignmentAndDelegation: Assignment subject to consent; not unreasonably withheld.

signature.declaration: Executed by Iain Brown, SVP, Chief Financial Officer
Executed by Caroline Loew, Ph.D., President
